title: Executive Order 6031-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Alice W. Goodwin
content: Miss Alice W. Goodwin, who, since September 8, 1924, has been serving in a position in the Post Office Department excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6031-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Alice W. Goodwin Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361581
